useCase.name: Research Participant Recruitment
useCase.description: Manage the process of recruiting research participants

preconditions.precondition: Researcher has identified criteria for participants

successEndConditions.condition: Final list of interview participants is confirmed

mainSequence.step: Recruitment Tool queries potential participants from Database
Database returns list of potential participants to Recruitment Tool
Recruitment Tool sends invitation for interview to Participants
Recruitment Tool reports responses (accept/decline) to Researcher
Recruitment Tool confirms interview schedule with Participants
Recruitment Tool finalizes list of interview participants
